snippet: Gov. Andrew Cuomo is tantalizingly close to making political history and could set an example for the rest of the country.
abstract: Editorial notes New York Gov Andrew Cuomo and state lawmakers are tantalizingly close to enacting a campaign-finance reform law; holds reform will weaken the power of special interests and make elections more competitive; contends if law passes as part of this year's budget, it could set an example for the rest of the country.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew Cuomo is tantalizingly close to making political history and could set an example for the rest of the country.

headline.main: Can New York Lead on Campaign Finance Reform?
headline.print_headline: Can New York Lead on Campaign Finance Reform?
